item.title: Super Mario Bros. Wonder Nintendo Switch 2 Edition Release Date Announced
item.content:encoded:
A release date has been announced for the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition of Super Mario Bros. Wonder.

Return to the world of the Flower Kingdom and Super Mario Bros. Wonder in Super Mario Bros. Wonder – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition + Meetup in Bellabel Park when the game releases on March 26, 2026.

In this paid update to the 2023 release on the original Nintendo Switch, players will not only get to experience all of the Wonder Effects that breathed new life into the 2D Mario franchise, but they’re also going to be able to explore the titular Bellabel Park, adding new multiplayer minigame-like experiences.

Additionally, this version will feature enhanced visuals for the Nintendo Switch 2 and add Rosalina and Luma to the cast of playable characters, just in time to ramp up hype for the upcoming Super Mario Galaxy movie.

Pricing for Super Mario Bros. Wonder on the Nintendo Switch 2

Pre-orders for the game are now available. For those who already own the game on the original Nintendo Switch, the upgrade pack will cost $19.99.

As of this writing, there’s no pre-order for just the Nintendo Switch 2 version of the game. However, the original Nintendo Switch version is still $59.99.

For those looking for a free Nintendo Switch game featuring a beloved mascot, check out the new update to Donkey Kong Country Returns HD, which brings new game modes, a playable Dixie Kong, and more.

For more Nintendo on Inaider Gaming, check out the sales data for the Nintendo Switch 2 in 2025.

Are you going to purchase the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition of Super Mario Bros. Wonder? Sound off in our official Discord server. Also, don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 7 Was December 2025’s Best-Selling Game
item.content:encoded:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 rounded out 2025 as the best-selling video game of December in the United States, staying on top for the second month in a row. The news comes from the latest sales data from Circana on January 22.

Following Black Ops 7 on the list were NBA 2K26, Battlefield 6, Madden NFL 26, and EA Sports FC 26. Only Metroid Prime 4: Beyond was a newcomer to the top 20 list, but Flight Simulator 2024 rose through the ranks and wound up 16th after placing 114th in November 2025.

You can check out the full list of the best-selling games for December 2025 below. In addition to that, the best-selling games of 2025 were also announced.

item.title: Battlefield 6 Was The Best-Selling Game Of 2026
item.content:encoded:
Battlefield 6 was the best-selling game of 2025 in the United States. The news was broken on January 22 by Circana’s Mat Piscatella.

DICE’s latest shooter might have slipped from the top spot back in November, but it managed to top the yearly charts instead. That means that in just under three months, Battlefield 6 had outsold every other title on the list.

NBA 2K26 remained firm at second place, whilst Borderlands 4 and Monster Hunter: Wilds switched positions to third and fourth respectively. Rounding out the top five was Call of Duty: Black Ops 7.

Sports titles remain ever-popular in the US, with Madden NFL 26, EA Sports College Football 26, EA Sports FC 26, MLB: The Show 25 and WWE 2K25 all featuring in the top 20. Interestingly, some titles on the list weren’t even released in 2025, with the likes of Minecraft and Grand Theft Auto 5 proving to remain top-sellers.

You can check out the full list of the best-selling games of 2025 below.

Best-Selling Games Of 2025

  2. NBA 2K26
  3. Borderlands 4

item.title: YAPYAP Official Release Date Countdown
item.content:encoded:
You might have to clap clap for YAPYAP when all is said and done in 2026. It has the potential to be one of the year’s big multiplayer titles, and you’ll be kicking yourself if you weren’t on board with YAPYAP’s release date sooner.

Joining a hype train halfway through is fun, but it’s better when you’re seated from the start. YAPYAP could be that game, and follow in the footsteps of memorable 2025 indie multiplayer hits like REPO and Peak.

When Is YAPYAP Coming Out? Release Date, Explained

February 3 is the confirmed release date for YAPYAP, and it follows the success of the demo.

Yes, YAPYAP has been in existence for a while, and many have already tried out its co-op carnage via a free Steam demo. The testing and trialing are over now, as it’s time for YAPYAP’s full release date.

The official announcement arrived on January 19, when Maison Bap had a message for Steam:

“Hey everyone! We’re happy to announce that YAPYAP officially launches on February 3rd Thank you to everyone who took the time to play the demo. The feedback we received was invaluable and allowed us to make significant improvements across the entire game, refining systems, fixing rough edges, and expanding on what worked best.”

What Is YAPYAP?

Maison Bap’s YAPYAP is a multiplayer game that blends teamwork, horror, and all-around silliness to create another entry in the popular online co-op genre.

Now, you can play YAPYAP by yourself, but these games are always better with someone else to shout at or BE shouted at by—we’re all friends here. Among Us and Lethal Company really popularized this genre of people working together online, invading a location, grabbing resources, or recording footage, and trying to get them out while avoiding monsters.

YAPYAP is just that, only this time, you can all cast spells by actually saying them out loud into your microphone. You can create projectiles, turn your friends into tiny people, use Crystal Balls to guide your way, and literally fly around the castle.

Think of Harry Potter, only Harry, Hermione, and Ron remain unruly children forever and intend to cause as much mayhem as possible.

Check out the full launch trailer right here.

Is this already one of 2026’s Steam indie must-haves for your wishlist? What makes YAPYAP stand out from the pack? Feel free to post your gameplay impressions if you played the demo via the free-to-join Insider Gaming Discord Server.

The gaming industry always needs more fun and affordable indie games. Check out the 8 biggest Indie games coming in 2026. If you missed it, be sure to review The Indie Game Awards 2025 and all of its award winners.
